lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: We are the wealthiest country in the world. I have been very fortunate in my life. I want to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find work in the IT industry

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: I believe in karma & the power of giving.  What you give to world will be returned to you in good spirits.
lenders.occupational_info: My work consist of configuring and setting up network infrastructure for the company I work for.  I also do Real Estate for the State of Texas.

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: I love to give.
lenders.occupational_info: Admin. Support.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have an opportunity to create a good life for themselves and others. This can only be accomplished if  we can create equal opportunities for everyone to do this.

lenders.name: Kate, Brian & Maggie
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed in so many ways.  I want to share in the joy of giving to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of workers at a warehouse for a large corporation.  My husband teaches Physics.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone to help themselves - give them a "hand up", rather than a "hand out".  People feel better about themselves that way.
lenders.occupational_info: Being retired gives me the ability to be able to volunteer some of my time to manage a local food bank

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: Giving is a gift to myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that the small details of getting something complex done goes smoothly.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: The Greasted Fulfillment is Giving.  I feel a sense of completion when I am helping someone in need and that I have a purpose in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a book keeper for a small Title Company.  I came from the Commodities Exchange after 12 years.  My work can be tedious and burdensome.  But Compared to some of the stories I read about the work load of people around the country, I feel blessed to be where I am.

lenders.name: Sage Moon Cottage LLC
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving back; not a hand out but a hand up and encourage independence and self-sufficiency
lenders.occupational_info: We are a woman-owned business specializing in organic, natural, homeopathic life-style in creating bath and body care products, for our homes, children, and family pets that are nurturing and environmentally friendly to all

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: It is a small way for me to connect with someone who needs help. I appreciate the opportunity Kiva provides to do this for those who are working so hard and just need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired teacher, but loved working with children. I now teach Sunday School children and try to practice what I teach about the love Jesus showed all those who were "heavily laden".

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I have so many blessings in my life and would like to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the office of a manufacturing plant.  I answer phones, send invoices, pay bills and assist the president and vice president.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in any way that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist customers regarding financial adjustments and activity on their accounts.

lenders.name: renee
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of people wanting to help themselves, not just looking for a handout. That makes me want to give even more..
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people feel better about themselves

lenders.name: Charles Xavier
lenders.loan_because: My Mommy is teaching me to be philanthropic!

lenders.name: Reno
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I am a dog trainer, outdoor photographer, and a database engineer.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Mick
lenders.occupational_info: I am an announcer on a radio station and an actor.

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: There is so much need in the world, it can feel very overwhelming.   It's nice to know you don't have to be a millionaire to truly help those in need!
lenders.occupational_info: Fitness instructor

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I too am self-employed and understand the enormous stress start-up costs cause an owner.
lenders.occupational_info: I write professional resumes for individuals via my web-site to allow them to gain employment or obtain a better job.

lenders.name: Mahri
lenders.loan_because: I think one should provide opportunity as well as take advantage of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a case manager for HIV positive clients.

lenders.name: Tom & Jan
lenders.loan_because: It makes us feel good to help.
lenders.occupational_info:
Me: retired truck driver.
Her: quilting business.

lenders.name: Nikki & Terry
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people that want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with numbers and Terry works with computers.

lenders.name: Neraldine
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hotel catring.I have a Bachelors Degree in hotel Manegment for ten years.I run a small resturan in Great Soppo Buea in Cameroon.I started this after I lost my dad in 1993.My plans is to open a good hotel  in buea.I am very good in hotel management.

lenders.name: Candyce
lenders.loan_because: I can. Giving feels good and I hope to make a difference in someone's life for the better.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I was blessed and would like to help others.

lenders.name: Lou
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can use a helping hand at times.
lenders.occupational_info: Making the planet better one house at a time.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate, in a position to help, and it is important to do so.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It feels good!

lenders.name: Anthea
lenders.loan_because: We can make the world a better place if we try!!!! *****Just one person at a time*****

lenders.name: Ria
lenders.loan_because: Because I can and I believe in the old saying "a hand up, not a handout".
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired executive assistant., now a happy housewife.  I enjoy some traveling and our grandchildren.

lenders.name: Kendra
lenders.loan_because: God gave me the means to help someone that would normally not have this opportunity.  Even just a small amount is changing these people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my children, husband and home.

lenders.name: Coleen
lenders.loan_because: I have a two small children and want to instill in them the value of community and sharing. We don't have a lot, but Kiva offers an opportunity to keep on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a medium sized office working on government contracts, supporting the Department of Defense. My main job is to help bring in new business and support current programs.

lenders.name: CATHY
lenders.occupation: Owner of Heavy Equipment Repair shop

lenders.name: Chad & Tara
lenders.loan_because: I especially want to support women in agriculture!

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing way to make an impact in the world -- helping others to get a leg up and launch a successful small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I co-own a small business that works with small businesses in the hotel industry. We create websites and marketing plans that help these inns and small hotels to market themselves.

lenders.name: Josie and Kathy
lenders.loan_because: This is an affordable way for us to help someone make a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired government employee and Josie is a Registered Nurse

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: We should all help each other.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a differance in the lives of these wonderful people. May God bless them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but have had the good fortune to have been blessed to be able to make a small contribution to people less fortunate.

lenders.name: cyndi
lenders.loan_because: I want to give.  I hope to help people obtain their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English speaking, listening, writing, and reading to 140  thirteen and fourteen year olds.  I also write screenplays, articles, and poetry.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. I want to invest in people with great ideas to help their dreams come true so they will be able to support their families.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: it's such a small amount to me, but means so much to others..........and it makes me feel good.  Good Luck!!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell stuff.

lenders.name: Mandy
lenders.loan_because: I am selfish and this makes me happy.

lenders.name: Daryl
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Period.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people change their life one thought at a time.

lenders.name: kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I love the message in the movie Pay It Forward.  Hopefully everyone will pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the contracts and radio commercials for our clients.

lenders.name: Debby
lenders.loan_because: I have received help in the past and now I am fortunate that I am able to help others.  It is a wonderful feeling.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for processing payroll for the company I work for.  I also take care of the bookkeeping, banking, and produce financial statements.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I recognize how fortunate I am and all people are interconnected on this planet.  My wish is that my loan can give the recipient hope for a better future for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: When a change is needed, I plan the project and guide a team to complete the objectives.

lenders.name: Lydia
lenders.loan_because: It is a selfish gift on my part. To know that I can help some one with a hand up is a blessing.

lenders.name: barlenem
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to  help bring opportunity  to other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people achieve their goals and dreams

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy giving people in need a chance to a better life whether through education or entrepreneurship, everyone deserves to have an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Tax Accountant in private practice.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I have always had a need for helping others and never really knew how until I saw this on the Oprah show.  If I can make a difference for someone else in this world we live in, then I feel that I have accomplished something and fulfilled someone elses dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Everyone knows what the military is, even in another part of the world.  We protect. and defend  our country so that we may continue to provide the freedom that we have in the United State.  We also provide help  in times of disasters for the United States and any other country that is in a disastrous situation.

lenders.name: sanjay
lenders.loan_because: for Medicine store

lenders.name: Steve & Mary
lenders.loan_because: We believe that the best way to financially help someone is to help them become independent.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I have discovered the joy in giving. What I have given in the past without expecting anything in return has come back to me in more ways than I could have ever imagined.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Improving the life of others gives  life more meaning!

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because: Having been to many developing countries and working for a Children's Charity, I am very aware of the need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a children's charity called The Smile Train. We provide free cleft surgery for children in developing countries.

lenders.name: Jerry & Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: We loan because all of us need a hand somewhere along life's path. Helping people achieve their dream is a blessing that cannot be purchased only shared.
lenders.occupational_info: Jerry is a retired ELCA Lutheran Pastor and Marilyn is a retired school teacher.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: It's something small I can do with hopefully a big impact.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: God can use $25 to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: When computers are broken, slow, or acting strange I'm there to remedy the problem.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and maintain computer networks.  I work with lots of computers to keep them running and up to date.

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.loan_because: we are better together
lenders.occupational_info: stay at home mom

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because:
People who are eager to succeed deserve support.
Also, we can show the world America can do more than bomb people.
lenders.occupational_info:
Before I retired, I worked with computer software. I developed computer systems for businesses.
Today as a hobby I still write software.

lenders.name: Lyne
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy and direct way to help those who truly need it.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: this is an easy to help make a difference in our world. Giving feels great, I highly recommend it. You are helping a family in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a construction field and help other people with ideas on how they can improve thier home and or landscaping.

lenders.name: Carolyn & John
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of giving people an opportunity to improve their lives, and help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Carolyn is a real estate agent and John teaches 13 year olds in the public school system.

lenders.name: Franklin, Laura & boys
lenders.loan_because: ...we are all one

lenders.name: Melalee
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help out.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I design landscapes and gardens for residences.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I am a single mother living in a country with so many opportunities.  I want to help someone else get their opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that sets up phone and internet services for businesses.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because:
"Do all the good you can, and make 
as little fuss about it as possible."
                               --Charles Dickens
lenders.occupational_info: Travel publishing and Internet development

lenders.name: Shanita
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference

lenders.name: Paulette
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and feel that sometimes we take things for granted especially some of us living in the US.  I feel it is my responsibility to give back because I have so much.  I do give back by helping to turn young people's lives around for the better. I wanted to do more and this is one way of doing it on a monetary level.  What most of the borrowers are asking for is pittance compared to what we make in this country for a living.  I have started several business myself and know what it feels like when trying to get money to start your own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a shelter care facility where I deal with males 13-18 who have committed crimes. The majority of them are talented, however most of them lack parental guidance and support.  I am like a surrogate mother who nurture and teach not just academic subjects; but also show love, encouragement, and inspire with affirmations on a daily basis.  It really feels good to be able to lend a helping hand whether in this country or overseas.

lenders.name: Stu
lenders.loan_because: I can. I have never had so much fun giving - okay, Sundays can be fun...but this rocks!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Episcopal priest, a local pastor who believes the old, old Story and is discovering with so many others that we are being written into It!

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my daughter and the home.  I am thankful that my husband has a good job to allow me to do this.

lenders.name: Dina
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to go from point A to point B in a caring and safe manner.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: to give people with ambition the opportunity to persue their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: retired

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I remember when I was starting my first business and a friend loaned me my initial seed money.  The business grew into a success and the loan was repaid.  I am now in the position where I can afford to help others.

lenders.name: Calgary Clothing Club
lenders.loan_because: We get together once a month in what is called "clothing club". A group of us (9 to 10 ladies)- going on 4 years now have been a part of this fun club and now want to contribute to positive change.
lenders.occupational_info: We are nurses, teachers, oil and gas professionals and stay at home mommies!

lenders.name: Hana
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I have been turned down for business loans, because people did not want to take a chance on us. I want to help others with the same problem.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part-time as a nurse in intensive care.

lenders.name: Rioux
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I did not get to where I'm at by myself. I had goals and people help me accomplish them. So for me being able to give or help someone make a difference in building their lives, Is truly a blessing to myself and others because I can give!

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I know how good it feels to make enough money to buy the necessities.  I really want the small business owners to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from substitute teaching.  Right now I sell on a auction site on the internet.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: Focusing on someone besides me makes me feel better about myself.  I have been blessed, but forget that sometimes.  Being a blessing to someone else disrupts the "ME ME ME" syndrome.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money to me can make a tremendous difference to someone in need. I've always been a strong believer in helping someone help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage large projects for a telecommunications company.

lenders.name: Cathie
lenders.loan_because: What a great opportunity to help someone be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to mantain my companies product in the retail accounts.  I manager a group of 25 people in several states.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I love being able to help those that want to improve themselves for their family. It's so little to me but can mean so much to someone else.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: Helping people get started in business is a wonderful thing.  It not only helps the person and their family, but it helps the communities as well.  Everyone should get involved in this great opportunity to give to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the New York City Police Department, which is challenging and rewarding at the same time.  Helping people is what we do.

lenders.name: Debi
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is a great way to help those in need who wish to work.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people. Although I do not have much money myself being a single mom of 3- I hope to help others with what I have. I know what it is like to struggle as a mom. You want to give your children the world. It hurts not being able to. God Bless!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a Hospital in Pennsylvania USA- I am a supervisor for the Outpatient unit. I get to work with 22 girls who I love to help get through their day with a smile. I love to supervise because I know what its like to have an awesome boss. I try my hardest to get each and  everyone of them through their day with a smile.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: we can all make a difference

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: It gives me the opportunity to help people in so many locations.  Without Kiva I would never know who they are and that they needed help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a vocal and piano instructor.  My students range from ages 8 to 70.

lenders.name: Theressa
lenders.loan_because:
It is what God wants us to do and it feels good to help others, "just because"!
2 Corinthians 8:7, 13-14 — “But just as you excel in everything—in faith, in speech, in knowledge, in complete earnestness and in your love for us—see that you also excel in this grace of giving. ... Our desire is not that others might be relieved while you are hard pressed, but that there might be equality. At the present time your plenty will supply what they need, so that in turn their plenty will supply what you need. Then there will be equality ...”
lenders.occupational_info: I work with university/college students and develop programs which aid in their personal and professional development as well as their ability to be successful in school.

lenders.name: Dawne
lenders.loan_because: with a little help people can move mountains
lenders.occupational_info: Legal - Administrative work.

lenders.name: Mirtha
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I've been so fortunate in my life and I wish to share that. I also like the idea of empowering women around the world.

lenders.name: Rigel
lenders.loan_because: It's a good idea !

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I cannot imagine being so close to realizing a dream and being unable to fulfill it because I don't have access to the money needed.
lenders.occupational_info: We supply water and sewer service to our community of 1500 people.  We also have the Fire Department and the Park and Recreation Department for the town.  I work in the office, helping customers, doing billing, accounts payable and general administrative work.

lenders.name: Brandy
lenders.loan_because: My Fiance' and I seen this site on Oprah yesterday and I felt compelled to contribute. I feel that this is a way for me to impact someone's life in a bigger way than I could've ever imagined. How wonderful is it, that so little goes so far in a different part of world. I've been a Single Mother for most of my daughters life. She's eleven. I've struggled and I've received lots of help without even asking for it. God has put some wonderful people in my life. I wish all of the blessings of the world to you all and best of luck!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Law Firm for a wonderful Attorney. I realize how blessed I am to have a decent job and great bosses. It's not the most challenging job in the world, but it does pay the bills.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to share God's love with others who need a helping hand.  Many hands have helped me over the years and now it's my turn! I want to teach my children to be givers too.
lenders.occupational_info: I think most people know what nurses do!  I care for the sick.  I do home health so I get to spend one-on-one time with people and I really love that part of my job.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: It's the gift that keeps on giving--it keeps MY spirit alive too!!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell gift items in a store and manage the store as well.  It's not my store, I work for a corporation.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I Can

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: it helps other people to support themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: People who are able and willing to work for a better life for their families and themselves should get the chance to succeed.  Loaning money can greatly help them achieve this goal.  I'm happy to be a contributor to their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean house, take care of my baby, laundry, cook and do shopping for my home and family.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: it is a great and rewarding feeling to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people save money on their dental and health benefits.

lenders.name: Maya
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have a very good life. I believe strongly in helping the unfortunate.

lenders.name: Lesli & Mark
lenders.loan_because: we should always help those who need it when we have the opportunity.

lenders.name: luv swans
lenders.loan_because: it is my way of paying it forward and I am blessed to be able to share what I have with someone who tries to better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
homemaker
retired Dr. office Mgr.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is our responsibility to help others whenever we are able.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I consider myself blessed and would like to pass it on in whatever little ways that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my two little girls and try to keep the housework up as much as possible.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Even though my loan may seem small to some, to others it makes a tremendous difference in their lives.  This is amazing to me and I want to be a part of it!
lenders.occupational_info: My work is in special education.

lenders.name: Ameet & Claire Wadhwani
lenders.loan_because:
We loan because we know how much of a difference it can make to help break the cycle of poverty and support people in being self-sufficient and providing for their families. 

We loan to compliment the work we support through charitable giving and to create meaningful lasting change.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to make the world a better place for my grandchildren.

lenders.name: For GGRose
lenders.loan_because: To perpetuate the legacy of Grandma Rose's love and hope for all people.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I have so much to be grateful for, and I want others around the world to be as happy as I am.  It always does the heart good to see others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a bank that makes large loans to people and businesses.  Now, I can do the same thing for those that really need the help.

lenders.name: Daphne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it opens up my channel to receive from others and it also makes me feel wonderful!
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to use the natural given talents that I have to demonstrate to others that we can have anything we want in life and by doing so, bring all good things to my life.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.occupational_info: Work for an accounting consulting company

lenders.name: Jeanicia
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world...I mean I could buy something for myself that I don't need or I could give it to someone for something they need to improve their situation (the choice is simple).
lenders.occupational_info: I create pictures for use on television news.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to achieve their goals and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide home care for adults with intellectual disabilities.

lenders.name: Mare
lenders.loan_because: someone once helped me when i needed help
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife and mother, a grandmother, a sister, a daughter, a friend. And i try to make a difference in any way that i can.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.occupational_info: I am an office worker.  I assist attorneys with their day to day administrative  needs.

lenders.name: Brianne
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lenders.name: don
lenders.loan_because: i have been donating for years to various charities... but this one has such a direct and personal impact...and it gives me the chance to give again and again to the world that has blessed me so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the federal government of canada and purchase whatever the government needs. but in doing so, i see more of what the world needs more of...like the many people of Kiva...

lenders.name: Silvia
lenders.loan_because:
Giving transforms lives.  
By changing our lives we transform our planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to enjoy a happier, healthier and joyful life through coaching and polarity sessions.

lenders.name: Tommy
lenders.loan_because: I see what people can accomplish when given the opportunity in providing for themselves and their families;  That they will do so with great integrity, humility and selflessness.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide security for American bases around the world.  I'm currently in Kosovo.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to help others enjoy life to their fulliest.  We all need someone's help every once in awhile.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help others help themselves. We all need some help once in a while.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired commercial carpenter.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: Ive lived in the third world and Ive seen third world poverty. At the macro level, this helps.
lenders.occupational_info: Work on computer systems for aeroplanes.

lenders.name: Reba
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled all over the world and have seen the need firsthand. We are blessed as Americans and MUST give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in sales and am passionate about what I do. I make dreams come true!

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who have less opportunities than I do.

lenders.name: JUDI
lenders.loan_because: to give back for the many blessings that God has given me and my family.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe that giving to others really defines who we are and makes the world a better place to live in!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find the homes of their dreams to buy and live in!

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: it's so easy
lenders.occupational_info: I identify preschoolers with disabilities and set up services for them.

lenders.name: Steven & Susan
lenders.loan_because: We believe in microcredit,
lenders.occupational_info: Steve is in the investment/wealth management business and Sue teaches....

lenders.name: Jo L.
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a sure way to help end poverty.  Most people don't want a handout, they want HELP!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in sales.

lenders.name: CRYSTAL & MIKE
lenders.loan_because: IT IS THE RIGHT THING TO DO AND WE  LOVE  TO HELP
lenders.occupational_info: I ANSWER PHONES AND DO PAPERWORK FOR A DEMOLITION COMPANY AND MY HUSBAND RUNS A SHOP FOR A HVAC COMPANY

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
People the world over have the same dreams of success and security for their families. 

If those of us who have always been blessed can help others,  we should do it as one of the responsibilities of being human.
lenders.occupational_info: I support educators by helping them to develop teaching materials.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an amazing way to positivly impact someone's life and address the issue of global poverty. I strongly belive in lending a helping hand rather than providing a hand-out. I must say that I think Kiva should be working domestically as well as internationally durring this tough economic state. The stronger we are at home the more we will be able to do abroad.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to spend $25 than to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Insurance

lenders.name: KivaMom
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are trying to be the best that they can be.  I want to give to make an example for my son.  Who already has a great heart.

lenders.name: Juli
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young adults how to make movies look pretty.

lenders.name: Hilda
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a supervisor, an advisor and admin clerk for many Marines.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: sometimes all someone needs is a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: Capturing the spoken word

lenders.name: Giannangelo
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to help someone else have a better life, we are all one family with common needs and desires - if we help our brothers and sisters, we help ourselves - and together, we can grow!
lenders.occupational_info: We give workshops on sustainable organic gardening, have a website about how to garden organically and sustainably, and contribute to the local farmers market during the summer

lenders.name: tom
lenders.loan_because: I want you and your family to have a wonderful life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help teachers and school administrators make schools great places for all students to learn.

lenders.name: Alex & Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and it's easy. Alex gave his Mom more money to loan through Kiva as a Christmas present!
lenders.occupational_info: Alex is a college student with interests in international political economics and journalism. His mother Mary Ann is a writer and editor.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the "Teach a man to fish" method of helping.  This is a perfect way to further that philosophy.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide dental services to my patients in a small city in Northwest Indiana, USA.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I admire these people trying to make positive changes in their lives. It's a pleasure to give to those who need. It's even better when they're asking for a hand up, not a hand out.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: Be the change you want the world to be!
lenders.occupational_info: Program Coordinator for Continuing Education at Pima Community College

lenders.name: Ralph and Darlene
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired photographer and my wife works in the retail jewelery business.

lenders.name: Tove
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people I would normally never have a chance to meet.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a nurse, I take care of people who are mentally ill in a large city hospital.

lenders.name: Christi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small woman owned masonry contractor.

lenders.name: Zohra
lenders.loan_because: There's always someone that needs it more than I do and I want to make a change!

lenders.name: Millionaire Mommy ND
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I achieved financial freedom by operating small businesses of our own. It's my turn to "pay it forward" -- I share the story of my journey from minimum wage to millionaire on my blog. I've pledged my blog's net profits (from advertisers) as no-interest microloans for Kiva entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I feel good helping someone achieve their dream!  It's a win-win situation for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a group of doctors.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help provide opportunities to those individuals seeking what is possible for themselves and who are trying to make a difference in their lives and the lives around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide, information, guidence, direction and support to those people seeking to buy or sell a home.

lenders.name: Lon
lenders.loan_because: it creates a continuum of progress and opportunity.

lenders.name: Eliana
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all deserve a chance at our own success!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in drug development for the pharma and biotech sector.

lenders.name: Earleste
lenders.loan_because:
I am not able to do what I want to, but if I can help someone who has started and this is their livelihood I am all for helping them. 
My dream is to feed the hungry 24/7. So if I help this person maybe it helps my spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: Basically, I pay my company's bills

lenders.name: Marti
lenders.occupational_info: I run a Jewish community center, providing social services in the Bronx, New York City

lenders.name: Diann
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I can.
And I like the connection with people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach math from algebra to calculus.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the principle of "Pass It On".  If I can plant a seed, someone else will water it, and God will make it grow!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist lawyers in preparing for trial.

lenders.name: Leanne
lenders.loan_because: I was raised in South America and Iran because of my father's business.  I met amazing wonderful people, whom I still think of today.  I would like to help people around the world provide more for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business owners motivate and train their employees.

lenders.name: Klayton
lenders.loan_because: Person to person is the only way this world will improve.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the travel industry.

lenders.name: Alsia
lenders.loan_because: I like that I can help someone achieve their goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the foodservice industry.

lenders.name: Aspenglow Services
lenders.loan_because: the only way we will ever realize real peace in this world is when everyone is given the same opportunities to succeed and prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: Aspenglow Services provides website design and technical support, primarily to independent insurance agencies throughout the United States and Canada.

lenders.name: Jeff  & Blandean
lenders.loan_because: IT'S BETTER TO GIVE THAN RECIEVE,   IT FELLS GOOD TO HELP PEOPLE'   give to those who do not have
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big place that makes cakes and sends them to grocery stores to sell  and my husband drives a truck

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It's fun! Really....I love that I can send a little money to actively help someone and, when they pay me back, I can turn around and do it again and again.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm essentially an administrative assistant for a non-profit organization. I work a lot in Microsoft Office products (Word, Excel, Access) doing reports, maintaining databases, and livening up boring documents with pictures and fun fonts.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Chef in a high volume restaurant.  I also recently started my own business making and selling  Jewellery

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering individuals and because I simply enjoy giving.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can. I am not rich by North American standards but what little I can give helps make a difference in someone else's life in another part of the world where they are not as fortunate. I am grateful for being born Canadian and to have the opportunities I have. Women in other parts of the world aren't so lucky and I want to help them. My Mom raised three kids on her own on a nurses salary and we got by alright but if we were in a poor part of the world I know we would of suffered tremendously. I feel for the many single Mom's and children in the third world countries.
lenders.occupational_info:
Soy una designadora grafica.
I create advertisements, pakckaging, websites and illustrations to help promote and market businesses.

lenders.name: Ilene
lenders.loan_because: I care.  I love the idea of helping people be self-sufficient by being able to sustain a business and earn a living.  It's the whole "give a fish vs. teach to fish" thing. :)  Thanks to Kiva for making it so easy.
lenders.occupational_info: people who want to advertise their products in the magazines I work for buy advertising space from me.

lenders.name: Stefania
lenders.loan_because: It's great to know that with so little I can help someone else to improve his/her life, I feel it is my duty

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: Whenever you help someone else out in their time of need it always comes back 10 fold in blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a center for soldiers in Vicenza Italy.  It's a place where they can come in relax, watch a movie, play video games, read, eat and get away from their daily grind.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: We should all do what we can, no matter how little, and together we can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a law firm preparing legal documents for the purchase, sale and/or mortgage of real estate.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: because I believe that I can empower someone to better themselves which in turn enriches their families and hopefully, their communities.  Since this is not just a gift, the person receiving the loan has a stake in making the most of their loan and receiving the joy of accomplishment when they pay it back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people reach their dream of owning their own home.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!
lenders.occupational_info:
My husband is self-employed.
I work as his assistant.

lenders.name: Daryl
lenders.loan_because: I got help to start a business, so I know how important it is, plus entreprenuers are my favourite people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help Clients market their brands

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to give back to the community as well as the world in needs.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Steve and Lisa
lenders.loan_because: We believe that people should be given an opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We both work in marketing with large multinational companies

lenders.name: Don Gregory
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, give someone a chance at their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retail manager, I manage 463 people in my facility.

lenders.name: Linda & Karl
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  Everyone wins.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and have a wonderful life.   Now it is time to give someone a hand.

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: I was touched by the story of how/why Kiva.org was created.  I love the idea inparticular of women helping women, being able to reach out across the world to others trying to help themselves & their families.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: Video Production

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is in developing countries just to get a helping hand so I lend because I know the money is going toward worthwhile projects that help people to become self sustaining.
lenders.occupational_info: Raw food preparation, Feng Shui (Not just the furniture placement) Photography, Natural Sciences, Baking, Recipe Development, Web Design, Print Marketing, Web Video Production, Writing.

lenders.name: Char
lenders.loan_because: There is no greater feeling than helping others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others Feel Good every day!

lenders.name: Frank and Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: we are all of one world ....we can all  'pay it forward'..our greatest gift to humankind is the knowledge that someone really cares and that 'you' whoever/wherever .. are important..welcome to the human race at its best..right here on kiva
lenders.occupational_info: we are retired military , Frank works in the Telecommunications field , I am a Western Artist and take care of our tiny horses.

lenders.name: YOLANDE
lenders.loan_because: it helps others

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: "Charity is not an answer to poverty. It only helps poverty to continue. It creates dependency and takes away individual's initiative to break through the wall of poverty. Unleashing of energy and creativity in each human being is the answer to poverty." Grameen - Banking for the Poor

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I am unbelievably blessed in my life and it just feels natural to help others and pass it on.  And come on, we've all needed a loan at some point in our lives.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus and love helping people.

lenders.name: jessica
lenders.loan_because: everyone should
lenders.occupational_info: i work at an art gallery. i am very lucky.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It is the least that I can do to help those who have less than I.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide joy and entertainment to the elderly

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I like to give back!
lenders.occupational_info: Financial work - unfulfilling.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: We in America are blessed and I wish to follow the example of Jesus who reached out to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently volunteering so as to help in any way I can.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and want to help those who want to help themselves. It makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful idea to help people who do not have the funds to start up their own business. We take life for granted and this is one small step to say thank you for what we are already blessed with.

lenders.name: Denise Mildred
lenders.loan_because: I feel good about helping to create commerce and affording someone the opportunity to pursue bigger dreams and take better care of their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a married mother of two with a background in Accounting and Finance.  I have a 15 year career which spans auditing, treasury, finance, lending and consulting.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: So many have a definate desire and drive to succeed but maybe do not have the resources available to many of us.  I hope the heartfelt tokens I have offered are beneficial in some small way to helping get someone's life that much closer to sunshine.
lenders.occupational_info: Financially planning or mapping our client's lives in order to help reach their goals of starting a family, a business, saving for an important trip or looking toward retirement.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed in the United States and I respect these people from trying to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I feel especially blessed in my life and wish to "share the wealth."
lenders.occupational_info: I photograph special moments to remember.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I started a business with $200.00 and now have a successful business after 9 years.It was hard work and dedication, but with a little financial help and support anyone can be successful.I believe in you!
lenders.occupational_info: I have a lavender farm. I grow, harvest, dry,and sell lavender. I also make beauty prouducts.I enjoy my job !

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to feel connected to people in other parts of the world.  It is great to see how the money will be used. Mele, I think your jewelry is beautiful and I wish you success.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children with disabilities be happy and independent.  I also love teaching Isshinryu Karate and dancing hula.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: It's the least we can do. We have everything within grasp of us while billions of people just don't have a chance. I almost bought a new pair of shoes today for $30 but decided I'd go back tomorrow to get them. I don't actually NEED them and when I came home there was an email about this and decided that instead of the shoes I don't NEED I'll give to someone who has a greater need than trendy new shoes.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve ridiculously priced food to people who rarely finish it. But it pays for plane tickets to travel the world and visit the less fortunate.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Giving someone a hand up instead of a hand out can change their life without taking away their pride.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find homes.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to spread Jesus love through giving.  Pay it forward.  We must all take care of one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for my two children ages 14 and 5.  My husband runs a successful marine electrical business.

lenders.name: Kitty
lenders.occupational_info: I work with elementary students that have learning disabilities and other special needs.

lenders.name: Wuanda
lenders.loan_because: I am in a position now where I can be of help to someone. God has blessed me, therefore I feel obligated with pleasure to be a blessing to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: My field of work consist of assisting patients with respiratory diseases. I take care of sick lungs.

lenders.name: April Jones
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so many opportunities in my life. I would love to help someone else in their time of need.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am a mother with two daughters. We have been blessed with the things we need and I want to share with other mothers around the world.  This is a great way to do just that.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: It is the best way to change the world-one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info:
I own my own business and work out of my house. My business is with health products.

I am a retired school teacher.

lenders.name: Mary-Beth
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: filmmaker

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels to struggle with finding the financial needs to turn your dreams and talents into a successful business. If Americans find this difficult, I can only imagine the difficulty people in third world countries have.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.occupation: PR/Marketing, amongst so many other things!
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help in some small or maybe huge way.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I'm selfish -- I like feeling good by helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the in the Department of Pediatrics in a medical school.  I assist in providing medical services and research efforts for children as well as teaching future physicians/health staff.

lenders.name: alicia
lenders.loan_because: I believe helping people achieve their goals is a great gift.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe very strongly in giving people a hand up instead of a hand out.  I have been blessed in my live and  know I can help make a difference by sharing with others.   Together we can make a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at the college level to future teachers.  I am also a substitute teacher in our local school district.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others in need.  It's a big part of who I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I research CRM softwares, customize them and train people how to use them.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help others to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a small business owner.  I make, gift package and deliver cookies to people in my area.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to help someone to  have a brighter future.  I hope this will help even one person/family
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a home day care. It's great having an imput in a small childs life.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: It feels so good to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Wm. Scott
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I was a single mother so I recognize the extra challenges that presents.  I also realize how far a little assistance can go towards getting past those hurdles that life throws in one's way.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been retired since late 2005 but was employed as an assistant to a federal Member of Parliament for most of my working life.

lenders.name: Finley Family
lenders.loan_because: we have been blessed as a family, We decided rather than giving friends and family gifts they do not need, this is a way for many people to be Blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a Pressure Cleaning company.  We live in Florida where mold & fungus grows.  Our company cleans homes & businesses in need of this service.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up, not a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a degree in elementary education but I am currently a stay at home mom.

lenders.name: Griselda
lenders.loan_because: We're all blessed in different ways and should forward those wonders to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company manage projects and external associates.

lenders.name: Cyndi
lenders.loan_because: I've received help when I've need it, and now that I am in a better place financially, I loan because I can.  I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 8th grade English.  Most of my students are 13 years old.  I love teaching!

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: what a fantastic and creative way to make a difference.  This isn't a hand out it is a hand up!
lenders.occupational_info: Oil and Gas Project Accountant - I clean up MESS!!

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and wanted to give back to make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: " I have everything, yet have nothing; and although I possess nothing, still of nothing am I in want "

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others that aren't as fortunate as we are.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computer software to companies so they can run they business more efficiently.

lenders.name: Laila
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone less fortunate than me. And because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who need physical help. I cook, clean, shop, take them to appointments.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to improve their lives.  I have been lucky enough to receive help when I needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught for 33 years in elementary school and loved my job.  Now I am retired and volunteer for senior citizens group and a group, AAUW, to help educate women.

lenders.name: Maria Cristina
lenders.loan_because: It is in the giving that we receive...

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone else and everyone deserves a chance to take care of themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large California State Department and I'm a analyst working with the veteran community.

lenders.name: Elmer
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: I like to pay it forward

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want make a difference....small actions can add up!  I grew up on a farm and target my giving towards developing farms.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: Enabling other parents to build a better life for their children enables me to be a better parent.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because:
"For whom much is given, much is expected" 
I have been blessed !
lenders.occupational_info: education and social services to help  children and families.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: A few friends loaned me money to start my business when I was struggling financially as a single mother. It turned my life around. I want to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Sherron
lenders.loan_because:
We are so blessed here in America that it should be in us all to want to give to those that are in need.

"...When someone has been given much, much will be required in return; and when someone has been entrusted with much, even more will be required. Luke 12:48"
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to help manage the projects and clients that our company is working on

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It's a privilege to have this opportunity to lend a hand to someone who clearly deserves it.  Thank you Kiva for giving me this chance to share my resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of horses.  I clean their stalls, feed & water them, mow their fields & generally take care of their day to day needs.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Love is all there is !
lenders.occupational_info: Sales.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: Heard about this on Oprah!!  Just a small way to give back for the blessings in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell fragrance and flavor ingredients to Personal Care companies in the United States

lenders.name: Ann Marie
lenders.loan_because: I love to help other that are less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: Customer Service

lenders.name: victoria
lenders.loan_because: I believe in possibilities, a new earth of peace and prosperity for all who wish to participate.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start your own business.  I would love to make a difference in someone else life!
lenders.occupational_info: I help families find their dream home.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: Because it gives the Glory to God.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm responsilbe for implementing quality systems and improvments.

lenders.name: Zenta
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an office manager and owner of a restaurant. 
I believe that if you work hard and believe you can achieve anything.

lenders.name: Constance L
lenders.loan_because: I need to feel small so I give to those who have less then I

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little bit of help every once in a while. Someday it may be me.
lenders.occupational_info: sounds a little boring and not fun,but it is nice to be able to stay home with my girls in their first few years.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I have been focused to much on myself and what I don't have. When in reality I am truly blessed. I need to focus more on trying to help others and being thankful for what God has blessed me with.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a structural engineer, wife, and mother of one.  My work involves desiging bridges and retaining walls for the highways and city streets.

lenders.name: JASON
lenders.loan_because: I loan because my life is full of good things - family, work, and enough money to get by.  My family struggled when I was younger and helping others help themselves feels like the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Joseph Flores
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others when im able to do so. Especially those hard working folks who just need a little help and encouragement . . .
lenders.occupational_info: I play music for small and large crowds of people and get to watch them dance and enjoy themselves...

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I think It is important to help people become autonomous.
lenders.occupational_info: I have varied backgrounds and lots of education. Currently I'm involved with construction and education.

lenders.name: Edie
lenders.loan_because: It is my great pleasure!!!

lenders.name: Marti Snyder
lenders.loan_because: I find such joy in the faces of the poeple seeking these loans, helping to fulfill their dream is a blessing.
lenders.occupational_info: I do volunteer work and am building my home based business with Fortune Hi-Tech Marketing

lenders.name: MSC Learning by Loaning
lenders.loan_because:
Why do we loan?
 Someone may ask why a group of kids like us are giving money to people who are in third world countries.  If you really think about it we are in the same boat.  We are in trouble and have problems yet we are trying to change our lives.  Everyday someone on Kiva is trying to change their life.  I believe in order to move forward in life you have to change.  This is just what these people are trying to do.  We give loans not only to learn or to be a better person, but also to give ourselves and others a second chance.  So why not give a loan?

  by J.M. age 17
  resident, Maurice Spear Campus
lenders.occupational_info: We are  Maurice Spear Campus, a small school for at risk youth, operated by the Lenawee Intermediate School District in Adrian, Michigan.   Our school is using KIVA as a vehicle to learn geography,current events and philanthropy.  Our students raise money,  manage funds and write proposals for potential loan candidates.  They then learn about the countries, cultures, and political situations of their loan recipients

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: This is an excellent way to help others, turning a small amount from many into a lot of good.  It's good to help an organization which sends all the donations to the end user.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the budget and accounting department at my institution

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together

lenders.name: Josue
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of computers.

lenders.name: Teri

lenders.occupational_info: I teach science to children and I teach teachers how to teach science.

lenders.name: Meagan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, in any way possible, enpower women to become great at whatever task. Anyone can give $25 and there could not be a better feeling then helping someone else make a living and a difference--even on the other side of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help educate my community about our local Habitat for Humanity, who works to build affordable housing for low-income families.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to be able to and it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the more grateful we are for what we have to share, the more we will be aware of everything rich in our lives. Although I am very grateful for the creature comforts I have, my family and friends fill my heart.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an accounting firm. I am responsible for not only working with people on their taxes, but in making them aware of what they are spending and taking in all year long. I work mostly with corporations.

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's the right thing to do. I would like to believe someone would be there to help me if I were in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school counselor, serving the needs of teenagers everyday. I work to promote their education as well as their personal growth and development.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I believe small businesses are better helped by small personal loans as opposed to large corporate donations.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: Life is too short to be selfish.  Every little bit that can make a difference and ease someone's struggles is worth it.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference rather that just talking about it.
lenders.occupational_info: I love working with animals and want to help them have an enjoyable and healthy experience getting haircuts and baths.  i also volunteer at the humane society grooming rescue dogs.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I care enough to help others who are working hard, struggling to get ahead and provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a single Mom who runs a part-time Web Design business from home.  

A Web design business is the design of web pages, websites and web applications using HTML, CSS, images, and other media on the internet.

Whether your needs are business or of personal nature, Andrea’s Web will help design your presence on the web, in your own voice.  And, if you imbue your website with a unique voice, visitors will notice, remember and return.
